provider.name: Vodafone Italy
provider.description:
Obtains balance and other plan information on Vodafone Italy personal account (http://www.vodafone.it)

If you don't have Vodafone personal account, please register here: https://registrazione.vodafone.it/190/regu/checkLinkAccount.do
provider.author: AnyBalance Team <info@anybalance.ru>
